Text.val: This is an example of a read-only Data source. Although Modify is allowed, the user
cannot modify any data without an error message.
Task Properties for the Main Source are set to Read.

ExpSyntax.val: 'DV08: How Do I Access a Data Source for Read-only in a Task?'

Text.val: This task writes to two text BLOBS, then reads them into a memory table.
This reads in the blob, using a ':' as a delimiter
